name: P9070 Areola Kernel
body:
P9070/Presto kernel for use with AOSP 4.1.2 based ROMS.

Known working with:
Slimbean 3.1.0
Cyanogenmod 10
AOKP Presto - Jellybean
Paranoid Android 2.57.6

To contribute:
 
1.Clone the repo

  git clone https://github.com/marduk191/p9070-Areola_Kernel.git

2.Set up my upstream:

  git remote add upstream https://github.com/marduk191/p9070-Areola_Kernel.git


For a complete list of git commands to work with forks you can check the link below.

https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo

Submitting pull requests

https://help.github.com/articles/using-pull-requests
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
